column1: # sample information file for ChIP-seq analysis pipeline

column2: Name: unique sample name to be used for analysis output
Fq1/2: Read1 and 2 of fastq files
Ctrl: sample "Name" to use as a control for peak calling
PeakMode: factor or histone for peak calling mode
DownSample: Optional column for downsampling to use highly unbalanced sequencing depth across samples.
PeakOpt: option string for chip.peakCallFactor.sh or chip.peakCallHistone.sh
